general_error_popup_text_no_account: You have not added an account. Please add an account before taking any further steps.
general_error_popup_text_network_unconne: No network connection. Please check your network
assets_text_create_account_registration_: Limited by the current cost of EOS account creation, BitPortal will provide registration code to a portion of users to create EOS accounts. You can participate Bitportal official event to obtain your registration code.
assets_text_create_account_friend_assist: Create an EOS account via existed account, it will cost a certain EOS to purchase and stake certain of EOS system resources.
assets_text_create_account_smart_contrac: Create an EOS account with a smart contract deployed by a third party
assets_text_import_account_import_privat: Enter the private key of an existing account, and add your account into BitPortal.
assets_popup_label_pending_create_order: You Have a Pending Account Creation
assets_popup_text_pending_create_order: Please note that you have a pending account creation request. Please finish payment or cancel the creation creation request before adding another account.
assets_popup_content_delete_order: Cancellation will delete the order information and the private key, please confirm you will abandon this account or switch to other method before confirming the deletion.
assets_tos_popup_label_tos: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
assets_tos_popup_text_agree: I've read and agree with BitPortal Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
add_eos_create_popup_text_account_name_t: EOS account name is a unique identifier of your EOS account. An EOS account corresponds to an EOS private key with different access. According to the access of the private, an account obatains corresponding account access.
add_eos_create_error_text_account_name_i: The account name should be 12 characters consist of 1-5 and a-z.
add_eos_create_error_popup_text_account_: Account name already exists, please use another account name.
add_eos_create_popup_text_registration_c: Limited by the current cost of EOS account registration, BitPortal will provide registration code to a portion of users to register EOS accounts. You can participate BitPortal official event to obtain your registration code.
add_eos_create_error_popup_text_registra: Your registration code has been used.
The campaign is only available to invited users.
The campaign only applies to EOS.
add_eos_create_error_popup_text_create_f: Account creation failed, please try again later. If you have question, please contact us at info@bitportal.io
add_eos_create_error_popup_text_data_ext: Data extraction failed, please try again later.
add_eos_create_friend_assistance_text_ti: 1. EOS token is required to create an account. Please use an wallet with EOS balance to scan the QR code below to pay for the creation.
2. Please carefully check and back up your private key after creation to avoid the risk of asset lost.
add_eos_create_smart_contract_text_tip3:
Note: 
This creation method is using a smart contract deployed by the DappPub team and does not involve manual operations during the process. If the asset lost due to an incorrect operation, BitPortal will not be able to help the user to retrieve. 
Open source address:
add_eos_create_smart_contract_text_tip1: 1. Currently, only few exchanges support this method for creation. Please use the exchange which supports transfer Memo to continue the creation!
add_eos_create_smart_contract_text_tip2: 2. Please transfer at least 2 EOS to the contract to complete the account creation. The contract will automatically stake part of EOS for CPU and NET, and the rest will purchase RAM.
add_eos_popup_text_password_tips: Password is the credential to use BitPortal's functions. This password is invalid for other applications except for BitPortal. BitPortal will not store your password in any forms. If you forgot you password, please import your private key to retrieve.
add_eos_error_text_password_min_characte: Password cannot be less than 6 characters.
add_eos_error_popup_text_private_key_inv: Your private key is invalid. Please import a valid private key.
add_eos_error_popup_text_no_binding_acco: No related account is binding to this key. Please import a valid private key.
add_eos_link_tos: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
add_eos_create_error_account_created: The account name has been squatted, please try another one!
add_create_success_label_backup_private_: Please Back Up Your Pirvate Key
add_create_success_text_backup_private_k: Please back up your pirvate key and keep it safely. Please do not share your private key information with others, which could result in assets loss.
add_eos_hint_popup_text_private_key:
Owner Key: Account master authority, declare the final attribution of this account. Only few transactions require the use of Owner permission. It is recommended to store the Owner Key in off-line storage, do not share it with anyone. The Owner Key can be used to restore all other permissions. 

Active Key: Activity permissions. This permission is generally used to do some general operations such as transfering, voting, and routine transactions.
scan_error_popup_text_unidentified_image: QR code extraction failed, please try again later. Or use an image with higher clarity.
scan_popup_text_camera_disabled: Please go to system settings and allow BitPortal to use camera function.
scan_popup_text_album_disabled: Please go to system settings and allow BitPortal to use album function.
assets_list_text_no_search_result: If there are any EOS tokens that currently not supported by BitPortal, please
resource_error_popup_text_ram_insufficie: Your RAM is insufficient to initiate the transaction.
resource_error_popup_text_cpu_insufficie: Your CPU is insufficient to initiate the transaction.
resource_error_popup_text_eos_system_err: EOS System Error, please try again
resource_cpu_text_tips:
1. CPU is one of the resources in EOS network. You need to stake EOS in order to obtain CPU.

2. You can unstake your staked EOS. Unstaked assets will be credited to your account in 72 hours.
resource_cpu_text_tips_1: 1. CPU is one of the resources in EOS network. You need to stake EOS in order to obtain CPU.
resource_cpu_text_tips_2: 2. You can unstake your staked EOS. Unstaked assets will be credited to your account in 72 hours.
resource_net_text_tips:
1. NET is one of the resources in EOS network. You need to stake EOS in order to obtain NET.

2. You can unstake your staked EOS. Unstaked assets will be credited to your account in 72 hours.
resource_net_text_tips_1: 1. NET is one of the resources in EOS network. You need to stake EOS in order to obtain NET.
resource_net_text_tips_2: 2. You can unstake your staked EOS. Unstaked assets will be credited to your account in 72 hours.
resource_ram_text_tips:
1. RAM is one of the resources in EOS network. You need to buy with EOS in order to obtain RAM.

2. You can buy or sell RAM anytime.

3. Trading RAM requires a fee charge of (x+199)/200, x is your trading volume.
resource_ram_text_tips_1: 1. RAM is one of the resources in EOS network. You need to buy with EOS in order to obtain RAM.
resource_ram_text_tips_2: 2. You can buy or sell RAM anytime.
resource_ram_text_tips_3: 3. Trading RAM requires a fee charge of (x+199)/200, x is your trading volume.
discovery_dapp_popup_label_redirect: Please note that you will be redirected to third party Dapp "{app}"
discovery_dapp_popup_text_redirect: You will be redirected to third party Dapp "{app}". Your actions and usage on third party Dapp should apply to third party Dapp's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. "{app}" will directly and independently be responsible for your actions and usage.
voting_error_popup_text_no_stake: You need to stake EOS before voting producers.
voting_popup_text_stake_net_insufficient: Your NET is not insufficient, please go to "Rescource Management" to stake. NET is an EOS system rescource, and it is the factor of ur voting weight.
voting_popup_text_stake_cpu_insufficient: Your CPU is not insufficient, please go to "Rescource Management" to stake. CPU is an EOS system rescource, and it is the factor of ur voting weight.
voting_popup_text_stake_new_account: You have not stake EOS for your vote, please go to "Rescource Management" to stake.
export_private_key_text_note: The private key has not been encrypted. Please do not share your private key information with other, which could result in assets loss.
export_keystore_label_note1: Please do not share with others
export_keystore_text_note1: Peole can access and control your account via Keystore. Please do not share your Keystore information with others, which could result in assets loss.
export_keystore_text_note2: Please do not transfer unencrypted Keystore online. Once Keystore was hacked, your assets would be under threat.
export_keystore_text_note3: Please store Keystore in a safe device and keep it offline when unused.
export_keystore_text_qr_code_note1: Please confirm no one or device is monitoring your screen.
export_keystore_text_qr_code_note2: Please confirm no one or device is monitoring your screen.
logout_text_warning: Please note that all your account information will be deleted from current device once logged out. Please make sure you have backed up your wallet.
settings_node_error_popup_text_node_exis: The node your added already exists.
about_us_text_bitportal:
BitPortal, a Portal to the Internet of Value. 
BitPortal is a well designed EOS wallet which offers faster, simpler and safer services to our users.
no_login: Please create or import an EOS account
scan_simplewallet_signin_label_authority: The Dapp will obtain the following authority
scan_simplewallet_signin_text_warning: Caution: We will not provide your Private Key to the Dapp
